data.title: Obituaries – The Scioto Voice
data.text:
Guy Steven “Steve” Litz, 60, of Big Stone Gap, VA passed away Saturday August 10, 2024 at his residence. He was born September 10, 1963 in Ironton, a son of Mable Joan (Pieratt) Litz and the late Billy Otis Litz. He was a U S Army Veteran and worked in the maintenance department at Ridge…

Read More

William Patrick “Pat” Cummings, 63, of Circleville passed away Thursday, August 8, 2024 at OSU James Cancer Center in Columbus. Pat was born, May 7, 1961 in Portsmouth to the late Willard and Joyce (Holbrook) Cummings. He was a graduate of Glenwood High School in New Boston and retired from Jess Howard Electric after 18…

Read More

Pamela McManus, 61, of Portsmouth, went to be with the Lord on August 7, 2024 at SOMC Hospice Center in Portsmouth. Pamela was born August 24, 1962 in Portsmouth to the late Gary and Irene (Weddington) Thompson. Pamela attended Cornerstone Nazarene Church, was a graduate of Wheelersburg High School and Scioto County Joint Vocational School.…

Read More

Randy Charles Age 73, of South Webster, passed away Tuesday, August 6, 2024, at Rosemount Pavilion in Portsmouth. He was born August 22, 1952, in Portsmouth, a son of the late Epp Jr. and Barbara (Morrow) Charles. Randy loved farming and raising cattle, riding ATV’s, attending family cookouts and taking camping trips. Randy is survived…

Read More

Diana Lynn Hutchinson “Sis”, 71, of Portsmouth, passed away Sunday, August 11, 2024 at SOMC Hospice after a very brief illness. She was born August 10, 1953 in Portsmouth, a daughter of the late Billy Joe Hutchinson and the late Sophie Apilado. As a former CNA, it was her nature to take care of people.…

Read More

Rick Carver Sr., 64 of Lucasville, died August 11, 2024 at SOMC Hospice. He was born March 21, 1960 in Portsmouth to the late Stoney Robert and Patricia Williams Carver. Along with his parents he is preceded in death by his wife, Penny Puckett Carver, a son, Nicholas Robert Carver, and a brother, Stoney Robert…

Read More

Mary Beth Morgan, 59 of West Portsmouth, died Monday August 12, 2024 at her home surrounded by her family. She was born August 12, 1965 in Portsmouth, to the late Robert Everett and Juanita M. Sagowitz Peed. Mary Beth was a loving wife, mother and mamaw. Mary Beth is survived by her husband Matt Morgan,…

Read More

Lori Sturgill, 63, of South Shore, KY., passed away Sunday, August 11, 2024 at Kings Daughters Medical Center in Ashland, KY. She was born in Akron, OH., November 26, 1960 a daughter of the late Richard and Teresa Chenevey McElhinny. Along with her parents she is preceded in death by two brothers-in-law, Bill Cook and…

Read More

Kenneth Drew Sanderlin, 78 years old, longtime Portsmouth resident passed away on August 8th, 2024 at Southern Ohio Medical Center surrounded by his loved ones. Kenneth was born January 31st, 1946 in Detroit, Michigan to Otha and Maud Sanderlin. He graduated from Portsmouth High School in 1964 and after served in the U.S. Navy.…

Read More
